languages.text: "По моим прогнозам, необратимый коллапс кардиоваскулярной системы наступит в срок не менее семи циклов бодрствования — любопытная, но, в целом, предсказуемая реакция на вживление пси-удушителя. Более детальный анализ органических повреждений я проведу уже после вскрытия особи".

"I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."
languages.original_text: "По моим прогнозам, необратимый коллапс кардиоваскулярной системы наступит в срок не менее семи циклов бодрствования — любопытная, но, в целом, предсказуемая реакция на вживление пси-удушителя. Более детальный анализ органических повреждений я проведу уже после вскрытия особи".

traits.locale_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system to occur in seven or more consciousness cycles — a curious but overall predictable effect of implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of organic damage after the specimen's dissection."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Selon mes estimations, son système cardiovasculaire devrait céder d'ici sept cycles de conscience, ou légèrement plus. Il s'agit là d'une réaction intrigante, quoique prévisible, à l'implantation du carcan psychique. J'effectuerai une analyse plus poussée des dégâts organiques engendrés lors de la dissection du spécimen. »
languages.original_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."

traits.locale_text: « Selon mes estimations, son système cardiovasculaire devrait céder d'ici sept cycles de conscience, ou légèrement plus. Il s'agit là d'une réaction intrigante, quoique prévisible, à l'implantation du carcan psychique. J'effectuerai une analyse plus poussée des dégâts organiques engendrés lors de la dissection du spécimen. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “据我推测，大概经过七个意识周期之后，该实验对象的心血管系统就会出现不可逆转的崩溃。植入灵能隔断装置后，总是会出现这种预料之中的古怪反应。到时候，我会把那个实验对象进行解剖，对她的器官损伤进行更加详细的分析。”
languages.original_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."

traits.locale_text: “据我推测，大概经过七个意识周期之后，该实验对象的心血管系统就会出现不可逆转的崩溃。植入灵能隔断装置后，总是会出现这种预料之中的古怪反应。到时候，我会把那个实验对象进行解剖，对她的器官损伤进行更加详细的分析。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Ich schätze, dass der irreversible Kollaps des kardiovaskulären Systems in sieben oder mehr Zyklen des Bewusstseins eintreten wird — eine eigenartige, aber vollkommen vorhersehbare Reaktion auf die Implantation des Psi-Drosslers. Ich führe eine detailliertere Analyse der organischen Schäden aus, wenn ich das Versuchsstück seziert habe."
languages.original_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schätze, dass der irreversible Kollaps des kardiovaskulären Systems in sieben oder mehr Zyklen des Bewusstseins eintreten wird — eine eigenartige, aber vollkommen vorhersehbare Reaktion auf die Implantation des Psi-Drosslers. Ich führe eine detailliertere Analyse der organischen Schäden aus, wenn ich das Versuchsstück seziert habe."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Estimo que su sistema cardiovascular sufrirá un colapso irreversible en unos siete ciclos o más de consciencia: una curiosa pero predecible consecuencia de la inserción del supresor psíquico. Realizaré un análisis más detallado del daño orgánico tras su disección».
languages.original_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."

traits.locale_text: «Estimo que su sistema cardiovascular sufrirá un colapso irreversible en unos siete ciclos o más de consciencia: una curiosa pero predecible consecuencia de la inserción del supresor psíquico. Realizaré un análisis más detallado del daño orgánico tras su disección».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「私は、循環器系の不可逆的な崩壊は、意識の7サイクルかそれ以上の周期で起こると考えている。これは、サイ・スティフラーを埋め込んだことに対する奇妙だが、まったく予想通りの反応だ。標本を解剖した後、器質的損傷のより詳細な分析を行うつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、循環器系の不可逆的な崩壊は、意識の7サイクルかそれ以上の周期で起こると考えている。これは、サイ・スティフラーを埋め込んだことに対する奇妙だが、まったく予想通りの反応だ。標本を解剖した後、器質的損傷のより詳細な分析を行うつもりだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Bilinçli hâlde geçirilen yedi veya daha fazla döngü içerisinde kardiyovasküler sisteminde geriye dönülmez bir çöküş yaşanacağını tahmin ediyorum. İlginç ancak ruhboğan implantlarına karşı verilen, tamamen öngörülebilir bir reaksiyon. Numunenin diseksiyonu sonrasında organik hasarın daha detaylı analizini yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "I estimate the irreversible collapse of the cardiovascular system will occur in seven or more cycles of consciousness — a curious yet altogether predictable reaction to implanting the psy-stifler. I will perform a more detailed analysis of the organic damage after the specimen's dissection."

İlginç ancak ruhboğan implantlarına karşı verilen, tamamen öngörülebilir bir reaksiyon. Numunenin diseksiyonu sonrasında organik hasarın daha detaylı bir analizini yapacağım."
